title: Hour 2: Sue Bird joins the show!
description:
Four-time WNBA champion, five-time Olympic Gold Medalist, Sue Bird, Joins the show and talks about her career and upcoming retirement. Jay Bilas joins the show and debates Stephen A. about who should be the No. 1 pick in the 2022 NBA Draft and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Sue Bird announces she will retire after this WNBA season
